newsitem.title: USA: New York certificated cotton stocks rise to 62,693.
newsitem.headline: New York certificated cotton stocks rise to 62,693.

text.p: Certificated cotton stocks deliverable against New York Cotton Exchange's No. 2 cotton futures contract as of Oct 21 totaled 62,693 bales, up from 60,838 bales the previous session.
There were 1,855 bales issued, no decertification orders, no cancellations, and 8,455 bales awaiting review.
